typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Start as string,
		End as string,
		Duration as timestamp 'HH:mm:ss',
		{Total Energy (kJ)} as double,
		{Active Energy (kJ)} as double,
		{Max Heart Rate (bpm)} as double,
		{Avg Heart Rate (bpm)} as double,
		{Distance (km)} as double,
		{Avg Speed(km/hr)} as double,
		{Step Count (count)} as double,
		{Step Cadence (spm)} as double,
		{Flights Climbed (count)} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['raw','archive'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DailyWorkout
DailyWorkout derive(ActiveCal = round({Active Energy (kJ)} / 4.184),
		TotalCal = round({Total Energy (kJ)}/4.184),
		DurationMins = minute(Duration),
		StartTS = toTimestamp(Start,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm","IST"),
		EndTS = toTimestamp(End,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm","IST"),
		StartDT = toDate(Start,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm"),
		EndDT = toDate(End,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm"),
		{Avg Heart Rate (bpm)} = round({Avg Heart Rate (bpm)}),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ActiveCalories
ActiveCalories select(mapColumn(
		Type,
		Duration,
		MaxHeartRate = {Max Heart Rate (bpm)},
		AvgHeartRate = {Avg Heart Rate (bpm)},
		DistanceKM = {Distance (km)},
		AvgSpeed = {Avg Speed(km/hr)},
		StepCount = {Step Count (count)},
		StepCadence = {Step Cadence (spm)},
		FlightsClimbed = {Flights Climbed (count)},
		ActiveCal,
		TotalCal,
		DurationMins,
		StartTS,
		EndTS,
		StartDT,
		EndDT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dayWorkout'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WorkoutStg
